price: ហើយពួកគេភាគច្រើនគ្មានជំនឿលើអល់ឡោះឡើយ លើកលែងតែពួកគេជឿដោយធ្វើស្ហ៊ីរិកប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
